text:
ernal malnutrition.
o Micronutrient supplementation is needed for all pregnant women. However, some women resort to their
own supplements and to complementary medicine, which is often not regulated and might not provide
adequate nutritional support. It is essential to check medications and all supplements for adequacy of
dosing.
o To address maternal overweight and obesity, counselling about healthy eating and keeping physically
active is recommended. This should be done with respect and taking
